None.Name: Shatter Lance
None.Description: Activate to release an element lance that is devastating to frozen enemies, dealing 2320 damage, up to 3480 in total. Reusable every 30 seconds. Affects frozen targets only.

None.Name: Blessed Strike
None.Description: Enemies attacked by this unit will stay frozen 25% longer as usually. Lasts for 10 seconds.
